testcase.classname: feature to validate count of International Players in Team RCB
testcase.name: Check the count of International Players in Team RCB
testcase.system-out: Given Team RCB Player List..................................................passed When The name and location of RCB as follows................................passed And get the count of international players for RCB..........................passed Then validate for the count of international players is four................passed

testcase.classname: feature to validate count of International Players in Team RCB
testcase.name: Check the count of Wicket Keepers in Team RCB
testcase.system-out: Given Team RCB Player List..................................................passed When The role of RCB as follows.............................................passed And get the count of Weeket Keepers for RCB.................................passed Then validate for the count of Wicket Keepers is not less than one..........passed
